testcase.name: Load Home Page
Measure Home Page Load Time
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Measure Home Page Load Time Given the web browser is currently open ... passed in 2.002s When the user navigates to url "https://www.thejournal.ie" ... passed in 1.001s Then the "home" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.144s And the page load time is under "3000" milliseconds ... passed in 0.013s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Load Business Section
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Load Business Section Given the url "https://www.thejournal.ie" is currently open ... passed in 1.024s When the user selects "Business" from the navigation bar ... passed in 1.293s Then the "business" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.172s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify that articles load and author name is populated -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Verify that articles load and author name is populated -- @1.1 Given the url "https://www.thejournal.ie/business" is currently open ... passed in 1.108s When the user selects article "1" ... passed in 3.460s Then the "article" page loads successfully ... passed in 0.124s And the author name is populated ... passed in 0.057s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
